alert.note: Alert for Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 8:47AM EDT until October 02 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the city of Baltimore. * WHEN...Until 3 AM EDT Sunday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, flooding is occurring at the end of Thames Street in Baltimore. Water also nearly covers the promenade at the dragon boat dock in the Inner Harbor. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. The next high tide at Fort McHenry Baltimore is at 11:01 AM and 11:57 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/11 AM 3.1 1.4 1.9 0.5 Minor 01/11 PM 3.4 1.7 1.4 0.5 Minor 02/11 AM 1.7 0.0 0.6 0.5 None 03/12 AM 1.6 -0.1 -0.3 0.5 None 03/02 PM 0.7 -1.0 -0.4 0.5 None 04/02 AM 1.9 0.2 0.0 0.5 None Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/12 PM 2.2 0.5 1.1 1.0 None 02/12 AM 2.8 1.1 0.9 1.0 None 02/11 AM 1.7 0.0 0.8 1.0 None 03/01 AM 1.5 -0.2 -0.4 1.0 None 03/01 PM 0.5 -1.2 -0.5 1.0 None 04/02 AM 1.8 0.1 0.0 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
